reviews.review: Let me start by saying you need to bring an extra pair of shorts because this movie is cream in your pants good. I'm talking some serious climax action start to finish. The story played out perfectly in line with previous movies and brought back characters that you forgot even existed. If I had the option of clapping down Megan Fox or watching this movie a second time, I'd shoot Meg and choose the movie. We've got a true piece of artwork in a film here. Might as well cancel the Oscars cause this is winning every award.
It doesn't leave you with much breathing room, but it will leave you with a feeling you just watched a over two hour funny, action packed, and heartbreaking climax to a decade long movie.
I thoroughly enjoyed it. Poor wakanda though. All those dead aliens in that river surely contaminated their water supply.

Infinity War is an incredible achievement. Not only does it pay off ten year's worth of films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, it leaves us wanting more; it's the only Marvel movie I've watched where everyone stayed in the cinema until the end of the credits. It's not a conventional movie, mainly a parade of our favourite superheroes - all of whom get their day in the sun - and they're up against the biggest odds they've faced yet. Amazingly, amongst all this epic action we get moments of introspection, and in Thanos a very interesting villain. The jaw dropping ending won't fool you into thinking this is the end, but will make you wonder just how it isn't.
Really great but its dissapointing that some of my favorite heroes died.
Cgi does not make a film.  No interesting plot or dialogue. 100% cliches and endless fight scenes. I wasn't tired but i tried to sleep anyway just to get through it quicker...
Outstanding visual , awesome movie action with so minor flaws that's are really irrelevant to mention
A whole new approach to a villain and his cause. Loved this film!

Very disappointing movie. I don’t want to give away any spoilers. So, I won’t say why the movie was awful but, it was awful. Even my husband and daughter thought it was bad. It’s also really long and drags on. I wouldn’t waste your money on this show.

This reminded me of a bunch of outtakes from several movies glued together. It constantly jumped around from story line to story line. There was no emotional involvement with the characters encouraged, so even when some of my favorites died, I had a hard time caring. There were some very humorous points strewn throughout, and lots of action, but it was short on plot line and character development.
